step1_clusters.draft_title: EcoBloom Summer Campaign - Initial Planning & Deadlines
UrbanEdge Social Media Strategy - Planning & Legal Review
EcoBloom Summer Campaign - Design Revisions & Client Feedback

merge_operations.reason: Same project (EcoBloom Summer Campaign), discussing initial planning and subsequent design revisions/client feedback.  These are sequential phases of the same project.
Both involve project kickoff, timeline, contract review, and deadline communication. While different clients (FitFusion and TechNova), the core topic is project initiation and management.

Both relate to client requests, strategy development, legal review, and deadline management. GreenScape focuses on a sustainability report, while UrbanEdge focuses on social media, but the underlying process is similar.

ai_operations.reasoning: The initial clusters were well-defined and focused on specific projects.  Merging clusters 001 and 006 consolidates the EcoBloom campaign discussion into a single, more comprehensive cluster. Merging 002 and 003, and 004 and 005, reduces the number of clusters while maintaining semantic coherence. No clusters exceeded the message count threshold requiring splitting. The target cluster count of 12-15 is achieved with these merges.
